23  void ComplexFFT::execute(Cmatrix& indata, Cmatrix& outdata) throw (bad_matrix_size) {
24  if ((indata.size1() != outdata.size1()) || (indata.size2() != outdata.size2())) {
25  throw bad_matrix_size("ComplexFFT::execute");
26  }
27 
28  if (indata.size2() != mLogicalSize) {
29  mPlanNeedsUpdate = true;
30  }
31  if (mPlanNeedsUpdate) {
32  mLogicalSize = indata.size2();
33  MakePlan();
34  }
35 
36  size_t isize1 = indata.size1();
37 
38  for (size_t i = 0; i < isize1; i++) {
39 
40  fftw_execute_dft(
41  mPlan,
42  (fftw_complex*) & indata(i, 0),
43  (fftw_complex*) & outdata(i, 0)
44  );
45 
46  }
47  }
48 
49  void ComplexFFT::MakePlan() throw (std::runtime_error) {
50  if (mPlan) {
51  fftw_destroy_plan(mPlan);
52  }
53  fftw_complex *in = (fftw_complex*) fftw_malloc(sizeof (fftw_complex) * mLogicalSize);
54  fftw_complex *out = (fftw_complex*) fftw_malloc(sizeof (fftw_complex) * mLogicalSize);
55  mPlan = fftw_plan_dft_1d(mLogicalSize, in, out, mSign, FFTW_UNALIGNED | mPlanningRigor | mPlanningRestriction);
56  if (mPlan == NULL) {
57  throw std::runtime_error("ComplexFFT::MakePlan");
58  }
59  fftw_free(in);
60  fftw_free(out);
61  mPlanNeedsUpdate = true;
62  }
63 
64  void ComplexFFT::SetSign(enum TransformSign s) {
65  int SignNew = FFTW_FORWARD;
66  switch (s) {
67  case FORWARD:
68  SignNew = FFTW_FORWARD;
69  break;
70  case BACKWARD:
71  SignNew = FFTW_BACKWARD;
72  break;
73  }
74  if (SignNew != mSign) {
75  mSign = SignNew;
76  mPlanNeedsUpdate = true;
77  }
78  }
79
